About the Company: Emami Infrastructure Ltd is engaged in the real estate and infrastructure development sector.The company`s operation spans all aspects of real estate development, from the identification and acquisition of land, to the planning, execution and marketing of their projects through to the maintenance and management of their completed developments. In the commercial business area, the company`s intention is to build and lease commercial office space, with a focus on properties attractive to large multinational tenants. The companys intention with regard to their retail business area is to develop, manage and lease or sell shopping malls. In the residential area, the company aims to build and sell a wide range of properties ranging from townships to high end developments targeted at the increasingly affluent sections of the Indian population. The company also intends to diversify into other real estate related business such as infrastructure construction and development of hotels.
